name: Wizard of Wor
overview: Wizard of Wor (also known as Wizard of Wor Classic) is a faithful homebrewed port of the Commodore 64 version of the classic arcade maze shooter for the Commodore Plus/4, although with some enhancements over the C64 version. The game was primarily developed by TCFS, with additional code and graphics by Murphy, Unreal, Csabo, and Chronos. The game was released into the public domain on January 12, 2023
